content:encoded:
This week’s hour of Case Closed begins with The Ghost On Moccasin Hill, from The Adventures Of Michael Shayne. That story aired April 9, 1945.

(30:30) Matthew Slade, Private Investigator brings us our second story with Find Julie Raydon, his episode from May 21, 1965.

Download CaseClosed712

Case Closed is made possible by the support of its listeners. If you’re able to help out visit donate.relicradio.com for more information. Thank you!
